definition: everything is fine (idiom); all is well with the world
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Just get a cool tool and we're set".
sentences.chinese: 只要找到一個酷酷的工具就萬事大吉了”。

sentences.english: If you see the clock, all is well.
sentences.chinese: 如果看到時鐘，則萬事大吉了。

sentences.english: And please don’t think adding in a clever kissy smiley face will help matters at all.
sentences.chinese: 別以爲加了一個親吻的笑臉就萬事大吉。

sentences.english: Just wait until later on in the day after Mercury turns direct to make any move.
sentences.chinese: 只要等到水星順行之後行動就萬事大吉。

sentences.english: As long as she did this, all would be well.
sentences.chinese: 只要能做到這一點她就可以萬事大吉。

sentences.english: Dont worry! Mate, once he get here, Bob's your uncle.
sentences.chinese: 彆着急，夥計，等他來了就萬事大吉了。

sentences.english: The police are checking on every passenger to make sure that everything is all right.
sentences.chinese: 警察在對每位旅客進行檢查，以保萬事大吉。

sentences.english: Surely, it's stupid to believe that everything will be fine because we survived this time.
sentences.chinese: 我們可千萬不能以爲躲過了這一招就萬事大吉了。

sentences.english: Just, juvenile everything revolves around her, she's okay and everything will be fine.
sentences.chinese: 只是，少年的一切都以她爲中心，她沒事便萬事大吉。

sentences.english: And besides, we should not replace a filament bulb with a low-energy one and be done with it .
sentences.chinese: 再者，我們不能認爲就是把節能燈換上就萬事大吉了。

definition: stepping stone/fig. person used to advance one's career
to send (sb) away/to change the subject/to open (an umbrella etc)
(of parents) to bring up children for the purpose of being looked after in old age
clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: to ignore/to brush off/to dismiss/to pay no attention to
